Title: Black Butterfly
Writer: Justin Stanley (screenplay by), Marc Frydman (screenplay by), Hervé Korian (based on the French film "Papillon Noir" written by)
Actors: Antonio Banderas, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Piper Perabo, Vincent Riotta
Plot: A hot altercation followed by a gallant rescue gets a lonely screenwriter a front-row seat to a tense backwoods drama when he decides to take in an ex-con drifter. Now, he is bent on making his host a better man. Will this nightmare end?
